oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to colophon, copy completed in 1126 AH [1714 AD].

Ownership statements by: al-Ḥājj Ismāʻīl ibn al-Ḥājj Muḥammad Aghā, 1248 AH [1832-3 AD]; Muḥammad Saʻīd al-Usṭuwānī, [12]67 AH [1850 AD]; Shākir Ghāzī Bilāl, 28 Muḥarram 1282 AH [June 22, 1865 AD]; Muḥammad Anīs al-Ṭālawī, 1290 AH [1873 or 4 AD]. Another ownership statement is deleted.
Title not mentioned in Brockelmann, G, II, 185; S, II, 238-9.
MS Arab 87. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
